title.narrative: Support To Profiling Urban Risk And Resilience

description.narrative: The overall goal of the CRPP is that “cities are safer places to live and work as urban managers are able to implement strategic development planning and programmes that target specific indicators of resilience to multi-hazard catastrophic events. The organization of the Expert Group Meeting through funding from Japan will contribute to the above inidentifying a multi-hazard, forward-looking, integrated approach by learning from the experiences of Japan, from the practitioners at local government levels and academia. The Expert Group will review and provide comments and new ideas to the profiles developed; and these comments will further polish and add additional dimensions to the approach of the CRPP.

department.narrative: Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific
